TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit RibbonControlService extends System.Object
public ref class RibbonControlService abstract sealed

summary.span: Representa un servicio que proporciona propiedades y métodos para controlar la presentación y el comportamiento de los controles .

span.span: Represents a service that provides properties and methods to control the display and behavior of controls.
